biotools.summary: AScall is a web tool providing automatic processing of allele specific real-time PCR experiments: variation conducted real-time whereis each allele is detected by independent reaction separated into individual wells. The positive outcome of the reaction for a particular allele is judged by the increase in the fluorescent signal.
